entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as a student who has returned to Hogwarts and is talking to Harry about his mother's reluctance for him to come back. ("Why, what happened, Seamus?", "Seamus did not answer immediately; he was making rather a meal of ensuring that his poster...", "Seamus turned away from his poster and pulled his own pajamas out of his trunk...")

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as a student who asked Seamus what happened. ("Why, what happened, Seamus? Neville asked...")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one talking to Seamus and asking him questions about his mother's reluctance for him to come back. ("What? said Harry, pausing in the act of pulling off his robes.")

entities.name: mimbulus mimbletonia
entities.description: Mimbulus mimbletonia is mentioned as a plant that Neville placed on his bedside cabinet. ("Neville asked as he placed his Mimbulus mimbletonia tenderly on his bedside cabinet.")

entities.name: kenmare kestrels
entities.description: Kenmare Kestrels is mentioned as a Quidditch team that Seamus has a poster of. ("he was making rather a meal of ensuring that his poster of the Kenmare Kestrels Quidditch team...")

entities.name: harry's mother
entities.description: Harry's mother is mentioned as someone who did not want Seamus to come back to Hogwarts. ("She didn’t want me to come back," said Seamus.)

relationships.description: Seamus and Harry are having a conversation about Seamus's mother not wanting him to come back to Hogwarts. ("Why, what happened, Seamus? Neville asked as he placed his Mimbulus mimbletonia tenderly on his bedside cabinet.")
